definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: All of these lovely things by which he had set great store went for a song.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己曾经珍爱的那些可爱的东西都贱价卖了。

sentences.english: Food of all kinds he loved and lavished.
sentences.chinese: 不管什么样的食物，雷诺特都珍爱有加。

sentences.english: Some parents, alas, lack the means to treasure their children.
sentences.chinese: 可是啊，有些父母却缺乏珍爱孩子的物质条件。

sentences.english: Renaissance art is still appreciated by artists or today.
sentences.chinese: 现在的艺术家仍然对文艺复新时期的艺术珍爱有加。

sentences.english: When really wanted to lose only then sense has treasured ?
sentences.chinese: 难道真的要等到失去了才觉更珍爱？
心灵的安慰是我珍爱的花儿。

sentences.english: Mothers treasure anything they receive from their children.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈们非常珍爱孩子送的礼物。

sentences.english: Like the Venusians, women are motivated and empowered when they feel cherished.
sentences.chinese: 女人觉得受珍爱时，她会被鼓舞，充满动力。

sentences.english: The givers chose presents with care and imagination, and hoped the recipients would treasure them.
sentences.chinese: 送礼者发挥想象力，精挑细选，希望受礼者珍爱。

sentences.english: Its most cherished industries are crumbling.
sentences.chinese: 它最珍爱的制造业衰退了。

sentences.english: I was all teary-eyed watching the movie Precious.
sentences.chinese: 我观看《珍爱》这部电影时，眼睛里满是泪水。

sentences.english: Rooted in one dear perpetual place.
sentences.chinese: 在一个珍爱的地方扎根永驻。

sentences.english: No metter how hard it seems , it will get much easier.
sentences.chinese: 不管看上去有多难，总会遍得容易首先要珍爱自己。

sentences.english: Taking off my mask and armor, I cherish my true self.
sentences.chinese: 卸下伪装，解除战备，好好疼惜珍爱真实的自我。

definition: to place great importance on/to treasure
precious/extremely valuable/(honorific) Please take good care of yourself!
to cherish/to treasure/to take care of/to love and protect
life (as the characteristic of living beings)/living being/creature/CL:個|个[ge4],條|条[tiao2]
self-respect/self-love/self-regard/regard for oneself/to cherish one's good name/to take good care of one's health
